metadata.description: Garth Ennis and PJ Holden create another gritty war story inspired by the massively popular World of Tanks. During the mighty Battle of Kursk, a crew of Russian tankers find themselves at odds with the war, each other, and a German unit on the loose behind the Soviet lines. Collects issue #1-#5 of the miniseries. ''I love a good war comic and none come finer than those by Garth Ennis.'' --Joshua Rathbun (Outright Geekery)
metadata.name: World of Tanks: Citadel
